text: CKRO's studios and antenna in Pokemouche, New Brunswick. CKRO-FM is a Canadian radio station, which broadcasts at 97.1 FM in the Pokemouche-Caraquet region of New Brunswick. The station airs a French language community radio format for the region's Acadian community. This station received CRTC approval on July 20, 1987.Decision CRTC 87-576 The station is a member of the Alliance des radios communautaires du Canada. ==References== ==External links== *www.ckro.ca - CKRO FM 97,1 La radio au coeur de la péninsule * * KRO KRO KRO Category:Radio stations established in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in New Brunswick
title: CKRO-FM
